context: Yes, I do. Can you recommend some good ones?
resp: Bad Moms (2016) if you like raunchy comedy. Rush Hour (1998) if you like action comedy. And The Nutty Professor (1996) if you're looking for something more family friendly. But you do have more options. Haha.
